name: MLSoundClassifier.ModelParameters.ClassifierType
desc: The classifier options for a sound classifier training algorithm.

items.name: case logisticRegressor
items.desc: A statistical model that uses logistic regression to classify an input vector into a category.

items.name: case multilayerPerceptron(layerSizes: [Int])
items.desc: A neural network model that uses three or more layers to classify an input into a category.

items.name: var description: String
items.desc: A text representation of the classifier type.

items.name: static func == (MLSoundClassifier.ModelParameters.ClassifierType, MLSoundClassifier.ModelParameters.ClassifierType) -> Bool
items.desc: Returns a Boolean value that indicates whether two classifier types are equal.

items.name: static func != (MLSoundClassifier.ModelParameters.ClassifierType, MLSoundClassifier.ModelParameters.ClassifierType) -> Bool
items.desc: Returns a Boolean value that indicates whether two classifier types are unequal.
